name: Voltfox
description: Voltfox is a majestic pokemon that dwells within mountain ranges, radiating an aura of regal strength. It is a force to be reckoned with; its Electric Fury allows it to discharge formidable sparks of energy which it unleashes as a method of defence. In its day-to-day life, Voltfox can often be found carefully scouting its environment, alert to any potential danger and ready to act at a moment’s notice.
image_prompt: Voltfox::0 a dynamic electric-type fox pokemon::1.8, wearing a regal mask, in a mountain environment, lightning background, anime sketch with watercolor --niji --ar 3:2
